title: 12 - You Canâ€™t Fake Humility with Ruth Chou Simons
description:
You will love this episode with my friend Ruth Chou Simons. You can't fake or manufacture humility - it's something that God does in us, often through hard things. Serving others is how we interrupt our spiraling obsession with ourselves. And this happens in quiet, small, unseen places.

A seriously fun camp for your whole family: https://pine.co.ve/Jennie_6

Find Get Out of Your Head book: getoutofyourheadbook.com
